data.eml:eml: One the genus Tocama Reitter (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Melolonthinae), with descriptions of two new species from Indochina

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Chun-Lin, Wang, Chuan-Chan, Keith, Denis, Yang, Ping-Shih (2012): One the genus Tocama Reitter (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Melolonthinae), with descriptions of two new species from Indochina. ZooKeys 177: 37-48, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.177.2482, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.177.2482
